name: TROUP
short_description:
The group promotes an inter-disciplinary dialogue in empirical and theoretical aspects of international economics. We want to provide young researchers with the opportunity to present work in progress at an early stage, and enable the exchange of research ideas and networking. On a monthly basis, the members will meet to discuss their research in an informal and friendly setting. Guest speakers will be invited on an irregular basis. A mailing list keeps all members updated about group meetings and interesting announcements (calls for papers/applications).

Researchers from all fields are welcome!
